ABOUT ME: I'm passionate about knowledge, exploration, and personal growth. I'm fascinated by space and the latest discoveries and space missions. I'm also an enthusiast of engineering, which challenges my mind and allows me to apply my knowledge to creative projects. Reading is one of my passions, as it transports me to different worlds and expands my understanding. Researching and learning are essential parts of my life, always in pursuit of new insights and knowledge. I dedicate time to explore different topics and am open to new learning opportunities.
